verses.verse: And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> face, <S%H6440><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> <S%H853><s%> the physicians <S%H7495><s%> to embalm <S%H2590><s%> <S%H853><s%> his father: <S%H1><s%> and the physicians <S%H7495><s%> embalmed <S%H2590><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> were fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> for him; for <S%H3588><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of those which are embalmed: <S%H2590><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> mourned <S%H1058><s%> for him threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And when the days <S%H3117><s%> of his mourning <S%H1068><s%> were past, <S%H5674><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> speak, <S%H1696><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

My father <S%H1><s%> made me swear, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Lo, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> die: <S%H4191><s%> in my grave <S%H6913><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have digged <S%H3738><s%> for me in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> shalt thou bury <S%H6912><s%> me. Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore let me go up, <S%H5927><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> and bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H853><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and I will come again. <S%H7725><s%>
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Go up, <S%H5927><s%> and bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy father, <S%H1><s%> according as <S%H834><s%> he made thee swear. <S%H7650><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H853><s%> his father: <S%H1><s%> and with <S%H854><s%> him went up <S%H5927><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and his father's <S%H1><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> their little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and their flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and their herds, <S%H1241><s%> they left <S%H5800><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>

And there went up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him both <S%H1571><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> horsemen: <S%H6571><s%> and it was <S%H1961><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H3515><s%> company. <S%H4264><s%>

And they came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the threshingfloor <S%H1637><s%> of Atad, <S%H329><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they mourned <S%H5594><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> sore <S%H3515><s%> lamentation: <S%H4553><s%> and he made <S%H6213><s%> a mourning <S%H60><s%> for his father <S%H1><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And when the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the mourning <S%H60><s%> in the floor <S%H1637><s%> of Atad, <S%H329><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is a grievous <S%H3515><s%> mourning <S%H60><s%> to the Egyptians: <S%H4714><s%> wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of it was called <S%H7121><s%> Abel-mizraim, <S%H67><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>
And his sons <S%H1121><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto him according as <S%H3651><s%> <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> them:

For his sons <S%H1121><s%> carried <S%H5375><s%> him into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the cave <S%H4631><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah, <S%H4375><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%> of a burial place <S%H6913><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Mamre. <S%H4471><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> he, <S%H1931><s%> and his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that went up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him to bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H853><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he had buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H853><s%> his father. <S%H1><s%>

And when Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> was dead, <S%H4191><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> will peradventure <S%H3863><s%> hate <S%H7852><s%> us, and will certainly requite <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725><s%> us <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we did <S%H1580><s%> unto him.

And they sent a messenger <S%H6680><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thy father <S%H1><s%> did command <S%H6680><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> he died, <S%H4194><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

So <S%H3541><s%> shall ye say <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Forgive, <S%H5375><s%> I pray thee <S%H577><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> the trespass <S%H6588><s%> of thy brethren, <S%H251><s%> and their sin; <S%H2403><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they did <S%H1580><s%> unto thee evil: <S%H7451><s%> and now, <S%H6258><s%> we pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> forgive <S%H5375><s%> the trespass <S%H6588><s%> of the servants <S%H5650><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of thy father. <S%H1><s%> And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> when they spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him.

And his brethren <S%H251><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and fell down <S%H5307><s%> before his face; <S%H6440><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we be thy servants. <S%H5650><s%>
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not: <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> am I <S%H589><s%> in the place <S%H8478><s%> of God? <S%H430><s%>

But as for you, <S%H859><s%> ye thought <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me; but God <S%H430><s%> meant <S%H2803><s%> it unto good, <S%H2896><s%> to <S%H4616><s%> bring to pass, <S%H6213><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> to save much people alive. <S%H2421><s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H7227><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore fear <S%H3372><s%> ye not: <S%H408><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will nourish <S%H3557><s%> you, and your little ones. <S%H2945><s%> And he comforted <S%H5162><s%> them, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> kindly <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3820><s%> unto them.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> he, <S%H1931><s%> and his father's <S%H1><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Ephraim's <S%H669><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> of the third <S%H8029><s%> generation: the children <S%H1121><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> were brought up <S%H3205><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> knees. <S%H1290><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> I <S%H595><s%> die: <S%H4191><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> will surely visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H6485><s%> you, and bring <S%H5927><s%> you out of <S%H4480><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> took an oath <S%H7650><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will surely visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H6485><s%> you, and ye shall carry up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> from hence. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%>

So Joseph <S%H3130><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> being a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old: <S%H1121><s%> and they embalmed <S%H2590><s%> him, and he was put <S%H3455><s%> in a coffin <S%H727><s%> in Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
